title: Python å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°
content: MySQL Data Access Object12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940import pymysqlclass MysqlDao: def __enter__(self): try: self.db = pymysql.connect( host=MYSQL_HOST, user=MYSQL_USER, password=MYSQL_PWD, database=MYSQL_DB ) self.cur = self.db.cursor() return self except Exception as e: print(e) raise e def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb): self.cur.close() self.db.close() def query(self, sql, args=None): try: self.cur.execute(sql, args=args) query_result = self.cur.fetchall() except Exception as e: print(e) raise e return query_result def update(self, sql, args=None): try: effect_rows = self.cur.execute(sql, args=args) self.db.commit() except Exception as e: self.db.rollback() print(e) raise e return effect_rows
